text:
[Verse]
Feel the rhythm in the air
Dancing footsteps everywhere
Raindrops falling from the sky
In this moment we feel high

[Chorus]
Oh oh dancing in the rain
Letting go of all the pain
Oh oh hear the thunder's beat
Dancing with the storm so sweet

[Verse 2]
Lightning lights up the dark
Find the magic in the spark
Every drop a melody
Feel the pulse and just be free

[Chorus]
Oh oh dancing in the rain
Letting go of all the pain
Oh oh hear the thunder's beat
Dancing with the storm so sweet

[Bridge]
Splashing puddles hand in hand
No umbrellas we just stand
Lost in time and lost in love
Raindrops falling from above

[Chorus]
Oh oh dancing in the rain
Letting go of all the pain
Oh oh hear the thunder's beat
Dancing with the storm so sweet
title: Dancing in the Rain
